title: Pet Sitting
shortDesc: Professional care for your pets while you are away.
fullDesc: Our professional pet sitters provide loving and attentive care for your pets while you are away. Whether you’re going on a short trip or an extended vacation, we make sure your pet receives personalized attention, regular feeding, exercise, playtime and proper rest. We understand that being away can cause stress for pets — that’s why our team focuses on creating a comfortable, safe, and familiar environment for them. We follow your pet’s usual routine, administer medications if needed, and provide extra care for special needs or senior pets. Every day we send you a detailed activity update with photos or videos, so you can see how your pet is doing in real time. With flexible timing options — day care, overnight stays or multiple‑day care — you can trust us to treat your pet like our own, giving you peace of mind while you are away.
benefits: Daily feeding and care tailored to your pet
Daily activity report with photos and updates
Flexible timing and overnight care options
tips: Leave your pet’s favorite toys and bedding
Provide detailed instructions for feeding and medication
Notify us of any allergies or special care requirements

title: Dog Walking
shortDesc: Daily walks to keep your dog healthy and happy.
fullDesc: Regular dog walking is essential for your dog’s physical and mental health. With our dog walking service, your dog gets a safe, structured outing based on their energy level — from a calm stroll to an energetic walk or run. Every walk includes proper warm-up and cool-down, fresh water breaks, and close supervision to ensure safety. For puppies or older dogs, we adjust pace and duration to match their needs so they don’t get over-exhausted. Walks also provide mental stimulation — new smells, fresh air, socialization if allowed — which helps reduce boredom, anxiety and destructive behavior at home. We ensure prompt feedback after each walk so you know where your dog went, how long it walked, and how it behaved. Whether you opt for a short 30‑minute walk or a longer one‑hour session, we aim to keep your pet happy, healthy, and balanced.
benefits: Improves physical fitness and maintains healthy weight
Reduces anxiety and boredom at home
Monitors health and behavior during walks
tips: Use a secure leash and harness
Bring water for long walks
Inform us of any behavioral concerns or health issues

title: Pet Grooming
shortDesc: Professional grooming to make your pet look amazing.
fullDesc: Our grooming services ensure your pets not only look great but also stay healthy. We offer full grooming sessions including bathing with pet‑safe shampoos, thorough brushing to remove loose fur and prevent matting, nail trimming, ear and paw cleaning, and gentle grooming for sensitive areas. For pets with long or dense coats, this helps prevent hairballs, tangles, and skin irritations. After grooming, your pet will feel lighter, cleaner, and more comfortable — shedding reduces and coat becomes shinier and healthier. If your pet is anxious or nervous, our trained groomers handle them with care and patience, offering treats and gentle reassurance to make the experience stress‑free. We also give you personalized after‑care advice so you can maintain coat health at home: how to brush, how often, and signs to watch out for skin issues or over‑shedding.
tips: Schedule regular grooming appointments
Bring favorite treats for comfort
Brush pets daily between sessions to prevent tangles

title: Health Checkups
shortDesc: Regular health checkups for your pets’ wellbeing.
fullDesc: Routine health checkups are crucial for your pet’s longevity and well‑being. During a checkup, our experienced veterinarians perform a comprehensive examination — checking skin and coat condition, ear, eyes, teeth, nails, and overall body condition. We assess your pet’s weight, diet history, activity level and signs of stress or discomfort. For older pets or those with known health issues, we offer specialized screenings: blood tests, dental checks, parasite control, and nutritional consultations. Based on the findings, we provide personalized health and diet recommendations, vaccination reminders if necessary, and preventive advice to help you catch potential issues early. Regular checkups help detect illnesses before they worsen — ensuring your pet stays healthy, active and happy for years to come.
benefits: Professional guidance on diet and exercise
Peace of mind for pet owners
tips: Keep vaccination and medical records ready
Observe pet behavior and report any changes
Schedule annual or semi-annual checkups for best results

title: Pet Boarding
shortDesc: Safe and comfortable boarding for your pets.
fullDesc: Our pet boarding services provide a safe, clean, and home‑like environment for your pets while you are away. We ensure comfortable sleeping areas, regular feeding, clean water, and daily exercise or playtime depending on your pet’s energy and temperament. Pets are monitored 24/7 by our trained staff to ensure their safety and well‑being. Boarding includes individual bedding, temperature‑controlled spaces, regular cleaning and hygiene maintenance to prevent stress and infections. We also provide socialization opportunities — supervised play sessions or calm interactions — for pets who enjoy companionship. For anxious or senior pets, we offer extra care and special monitoring. With daily updates sent to you, including photos and status reports, you can rest assured your pet is in caring and safe hands until you return.
tips: Bring favorite bedding or toys for comfort
Provide detailed feeding instructions
Inform about any medications or special care needs

title: Pet Training
shortDesc: Professional training for obedience and behavior.
fullDesc: Our professional training sessions are designed for both puppies and adult pets to help them learn obedience, good behavior, and social skills. During a session, experienced trainers work on basic commands (sit, stay, come, heel), leash manners, potty training, and behavioral issues such as excessive barking or anxiety. Training also includes socialization — exposing pets to other pets or friendly humans in controlled, safe environments to boost their confidence and reduce fear or aggression. For long-term results, we provide a structured training plan, follow‑ups, and owner guidance — so you can reinforce positive behavior at home. Whether you need manners, leash control, or specialized behavior training, our sessions aim to build a strong bond between you and your pet, making daily life easier and more enjoyable.
tips: Practice consistency at home
Use positive reinforcement techniques
Follow trainer’s guidance for best results

title: Pet Photography
shortDesc: Capture memorable moments with professional photography.
fullDesc: We offer professional pet photography to capture your pets in their natural behavior and personality — playful, relaxed, curious or affectionate. Our skilled photographers use pet‑friendly techniques, ensuring your pet feels comfortable and safe during the shoot. We let pets explore, play or interact naturally while capturing candid moments — no forced poses or stress. Sessions can be indoor or outdoor, using natural light or pet‑safe lighting setups. After the shoot, we provide high‑resolution edited photos, perfect for memories, social media, or keepsakes. Whether you want a relaxed portrait, action shots, or a themed photo session, our service creates beautiful, lasting memories of your beloved pet.
benefits: Stress-free and fun experience for pets
tips: Bring favorite toys and treats
Schedule during natural daylight
Be patient and relaxed for best results

title: Pet Spa
shortDesc: Relaxing spa treatments for your pets.
fullDesc: Our pet spa provides a luxurious and calming experience for your pets, combining grooming, pampering, and relaxation. Spa sessions may include gentle massages, aromatherapy baths with pet‑safe products, paw care, fur conditioning treatments, and soothing warm towels — all designed to relieve stress and promote skin and coat health. Especially beneficial for elderly pets or those with skin sensitivity, spa therapy helps reduce anxiety, improve circulation, promote healthy skin and coat, and support joint mobility. During the spa, pets have calm, supervised time in a hygienic, comforting environment. After the session, you’ll receive guidance on after‑care — how to maintain coat health, grooming routines, and frequency of spa visits for best results. The spa experience offers both physical well-being and mental calmness, leaving your pet refreshed, relaxed and happy.
benefits: Mental and physical relaxation for pets
tips: Book spa sessions in advance
Monitor your pet’s comfort during treatment
Combine with grooming for best results
